CustomField.description: Number that determine the test variant distribution, example, if the variant distribution field is 10, then we are going to have 10% of this test sent as variant feature and 70% are going to be sent as control group feature.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number that determine the test variant distribution, example, if the variant distribution field is 10, then we are going to have 10% of this test sent as variant feature and 70% are going to be sent as control group feature.
CustomField.label: Variant Distribution
